text: hi
my name is fatima kamal and i'm going to
discuss and demo the newest feature
launch
cross account backup in aws backup
with this feature launch aws backup
customers can now securely copy their
backups
across accounts within the aws
organizations
customers can create an on-demand copy
job or an automated
backup plan to copy backups across
accounts
to meet their security compliance and
business continuity requirements
in case of an accidental or malicious
deletion of original backups
cross account backups can be restored to
ensure business continuity
here are the prerequisites to enable
cross account backups
you need a management account in the aws
organization
you need to enable the cross account
opt-in in the management account
to allow the cross-account backups a
source
account this is the account where your
production resources
are and they need to be protected a
destination account
this is the account where the backups
will be copied to
it can be copied to a different region
as well
you can use service control policies to
restrict which accounts can be used as
destination accounts in your
organization
once you enable service control policies
in your management account
you can create an scp that limits which
accounts can be used
as destination accounts regardless of
policies
your backups cannot be copied outside
your organization
providing an additional layer of
security for cross-account data transfer
we also need customer managed keys
across accounts
you can use customer managed customer
master key to encrypt your cross account
backups
aws manage keys are not shared across
accounts and cannot be used to encrypt
cross account backups
here is a high level architecture of
cross account backup
as you can see here we have an
individual member account
that is a part of an aws organization
and it has resources such as ebs afs
that need to be copied over to a
different member account in a different
region
with a cross-account backup feature we
can now copy
backups from the vault in the source
account to a destination world in the
destination account
whether it be in the same region or a
different region
we can have one backup vault in the
source account copy to one backup volt
in the destination
region or you can also have
many to one mapping where you can backup
multiple walls
from the source account to a single
vault or multiple walls in the
destination account
in this demo you will be seeing how to
use cross-account backups
to protect your data from one account to
another across regions
and restore the same to a source account
or to a different account
let us begin by logging on to one of the
destination accounts within the
organization
navigate into the aws backup console
click on backup walls we will be
creating a backup wallet in the
destination account
in the sydney region click on create
